1. Installation

1.1. Command line

This package is available on Python Package Index PyPI [https://pypi.org/project/ndict-tools/] and easy to isntall. Simply use PIP as below

(.venv) $ pip3 install ndict-tools

or use your IDE usual interface to install this package from PyPI [https://pypi.org/project/ndict-tools/]

1.2. From github

This package is also released on GitHub [https://github.com/biface/ndt]. You can collect from the release directory [https://github.com/biface/ndt/releases] the desired version and unpack it in your project.
